extracted_metadata.title: BFRHR Sermon Seminar
extracted_metadata.description: September 1, 2024 Sermon Seminar for Yamim Noraim Voices from Rabbis for Human Rights in Israel: our colleagues will be sharing stories and texts of action, activism and hope over the past months. Rabbi Sylvia Rothschild, Moderator Rabbanit Leah Shakdiel (Orthodox); Rabbi Amirit Rosen (Conservative); Rabbi Michael Marmur (Reform) קויתי יהוה קותה נפשי ולדברו הוחלתי I look to God, my soul awaits, and in God’s word I hope (Psalm 130:5)
